item.description:
Join us in cheering on my San Francisco Giants in Game 6 of the NLCS.  SF needs a win to force a Game 7.  I'm inviting the Boston San Francisco Crew (BSFC) to join us also!

Patriots/Jets should be getting over just as the baseball game is about to start!

Look for the RSN MeetUp group.

The North Star is conveniently located near the TD Garden and the North Station (Green and Orange Lines, Commuter Rail).  Everyone is responsible for their own food and drink. PLEASE MAINTAIN A SEPARATE TAB OR PAY AS YOU GO!

See you there! AND GO GIANTS!

 

Isabel
item.how_to_find_us: Join the Patriots Viewing Party that will already be there in reserved space
item.name: NLCS Game 6 Viewing Party at The North Star
